metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9275 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: UnRTF allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds memory access and crash) and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted RTF file.

criterions.comment: unrtf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
